Title: Beloved historic landmarks navigate an uncertain future after the LA fires
Description:
In Pasadena, The Gamble House was in a fire evacuation zone and its custodians are trying to safeguard its future.

Title: College students are running out of job prospects — and the situation may only get worse
Description:
College students are facing a career apocalypse.
To make matters worse, the outlook is likely to get even more dismal in the months ahead.

Title: Hyo Joo Kim rallies to beat Vu in LPGA playoff in Arizona
Description: Hyo Joo Kim rallied from a four-shot deficit Sunday with an 8-under 64 to force a playoff, defeating Lilia Vu on the first extra hole with a 6-foot birdie putt in the Ford Championship.

Title: Kevin McDonald, Superstar!
Description: In his new rock opera, the Canadian comedian and Kids in the Hall veteran conjures a boozy night from the nineties, with an assist from Dave Hill on electric guitar, Sarah Larson writes.

Title: It’s Always the Other Side That’s Been Brainwashed
Description: Nikhil Krishnan reviews “The Instability of Truth: Brainwashing, Mind Control, and Hyper-Persuasion,” by Rebecca Lemov.

Title: Are Near-Death Experiences the Brain's Attempt to Survive Lethal Threats?

Description:

Title: Bill Gates would restart Microsoft as an AI-centric lab after 50 years — "Raising billions of dollars from a few sketch ideas"
Description: Microsoft co-founder Bill Gates says he'd start the company again as an AI-centric firm to rival OpenAI, Google, and more.

Title: Final Fantasy IX fans think this new website hints at the long rumored remake
Description: Square Enix has just launched a new website dedicated to the 25th anniversary of Final Fantasy IX and fans are speculating it could be a hint at a remake in development.

Title: TeamRICOCHET unveils plan to use machine learning in its effort to ramp up Call of Duty anti-cheat efforts
Description:
